sentences.en: Collection includes prehistory, stone sculpture, numismatics, textile, and ceramics.
sentences.cn: 收藏史前史 、 石头雕刻品 、 古钱币、织品和陶制品.

sentences.en: Covers history of the United States and Canada from prehistory to the present.
sentences.cn: 另与《世界历史研究资料库》互补,后者涵盖内容包括美加以外的世界历史.

sentences.en: Some ballads go back to prehistory, while others record real events , people and places.
sentences.cn: 一些民谣讲述的是史前时代的故事, 而其他一些则记录了真人真事.

sentences.en: The altar, as in prehistory, is anywhere you kneel.
sentences.cn: 如同在史前, 你膜拜的地方就是祭堂.

sentences.en: The most of crown wear by the prehistory jade figures in China are rail crown.
sentences.cn: 考古所见我国史前玉人的冠式多为纵梁冠.

sentences.en: The prehistory of languages need not detain us.
sentences.cn: 语言史前史不需要扣留我们.

words.tran_cn: 史前；史前史；（导致事件、危机等的）背景

trans.tran_en: the time in history before anything was written down
